sep.gaia.state

Class GLState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • sep.gaia.state.StateObservable
        • sep.gaia.state.State
          • sep.gaia.state.GLState

  • public class GLState
extends State
    Class to represent and manage all aspects of the state that are essential for the rendering process, which includes the GL-matrices.
    Author:
    Matthias Fisch, Johannes Bauer, Fabian Buske

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GLState(float zoom)
      Constructs a GLState object where the initial values for the rotations and translations are 0, and the matrices are the unite matrices and a default bounding box.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FloatBoundingBox calculateBoundingBox(FloatVector3D glCenter)
      Calculates the bounding box on the x-y-pane taking the current rotation around the x-axis in consideration.
      FloatBoundingBox calculateOrthogonalBBox(FloatVector3D glCenter)
      Calculates the GL-bounding box for centered at glCenter using the current canvas-metrics and the states zoom.
      FloatBoundingBox getBoundingBox()
      Gets the current bounding box which represents the circumference of the currently depicted map.
      FloatBoundingBox getOrthogonalBBox()
      Calculates the GL-bounding box for centered at the current position using the current canvas-metrics and the states zoom.
      FloatVector3D getPosition()
      Returns the current position in GL-coordinates and thus the center of the bounding-box.

      Returns the rotation-vector.

      Gets the current zoom level.

      Sets the bounding box which represents the circumference of the currently depicted map.

      Sets the current bounding-box and updates the current position, so that it is in the middle of the box again.

      Sets the current position and adjust the bounding-box.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLState

        public GLState(float zoom)
        Constructs a GLState object where the initial values for the rotations and translations are 0, and the matrices are the unite matrices and a default bounding box.
        Parameters:
        zoom - the initial zoom level

    • Method Detail

      • getZoom

        public float getZoom()
        Gets the current zoom level.
        Returns:
        the zoom level

      • setZoom

        public void setZoom(float zoom)
        Sets the current zoom level.
        Parameters:
        zoom - The new value for the zoom level in GL-coordinates.

      • setZoom

        public void setZoom(float zoom,
           boolean update)
        Sets the current zoom level.
        Parameters:
        zoom - The new value for the zoom level in GL-coordinates.
        update - true to invoke manager-update. false otherwise.

      • zoom

        public void zoom(int factor)
        Zooms in or out by a constant amount, which is specified by the constants ZOOM_IN and ZOOM_OUT. If the argument is not one of those values, the invocation of this method will be of no effect.
        Parameters:
        factor - Constants ZOOM_IN or ZOOM_OUT.

      • zoom

        public void zoom(int factor,
        boolean update)
        Zooms in or out by a constant amount, which is specified by the constants ZOOM_IN and ZOOM_OUT. If the argument is not one of those values, the invocation of this method will be of no effect.
        Parameters:
        factor - Constants ZOOM_IN or ZOOM_OUT.
        update - true to invoke manager-update. false otherwise.

      • getOrthogonalBBox

        public FloatBoundingBox getOrthogonalBBox()
        Calculates the GL-bounding box for centered at the current position using the current canvas-metrics and the states zoom.
        Returns:
        The bounding box centered at current position (see getPosition()) and fitting the current canvas-metrics.

      • calculateOrthogonalBBox

        public FloatBoundingBox calculateOrthogonalBBox(FloatVector3D glCenter)
        Calculates the GL-bounding box for centered at glCenter using the current canvas-metrics and the states zoom.
        Parameters:
        glCenter - The center of the bounding-box to calculate.
        Returns:
        The bounding box centered at glCenter and fitting the current canvas-metrics.

      • calculateBoundingBox

        public FloatBoundingBox calculateBoundingBox(FloatVector3D glCenter)
        Calculates the bounding box on the x-y-pane taking the current rotation around the x-axis in consideration.
        Parameters:
        glCenter - The center of the bounding-box.
        Returns:
        The bounding-box scaled according to current rotation around x-axis.

      • updateBoundingBox

        public void updateBoundingBox()
        Updates the bounding-box held in this state to fit the position as its center, as well as the current canvas-metrics and the current rotation.

      • getRotation

        public FloatVector3D getRotation()
        Returns the rotation-vector. The value of each component describes the rotation around the respective axis in degrees.
        Returns:
        The rotation-vector.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(FloatVector3D rotation)
        Rotates the current rotation. This is done by adding rotations. To set the current rotation to a specific value use setRotation().
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation to perform. Each component describes the rotation around the respective axis in degrees.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(FloatVector3D rotation,
          boolean update)
        Rotates the current rotation. This is done by adding rotations. To set the current rotation to a specific value use setRotation().
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation to perform. Each component describes the rotation around the respective axis in degrees.
        update - true to invoke manager-update. false otherwise.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(FloatVector3D rotation)
        Sets the current rotation.
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation in degrees around the respective axis.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(FloatVector3D rotation,
               boolean update)
        Sets the current rotation.
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation in degrees around the respective axis.
        update - true to invoke manager-update. false otherwise.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(Vector3D newPosition)
        Sets the current position and adjust the bounding-box.
        Specified by:
        setPosition in class State
        Parameters:
        newPosition - The position to set.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(FloatVector3D newPosition,
               boolean update)
        Sets the current position and adjust the bounding-box.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - The position to set.
        update - true to invoke manager-update. false otherwise.

      • translate

        public void translate(FloatVector3D dist)
        Moves the current position by dist. The bounding box will be adjusted to fit the new center.
        Parameters:
        dist - How much to move in each direction.

      • translate

        public void translate(FloatVector3D dist,
             boolean update)
        Moves the current position by dist. The bounding box will be adjusted to fit the new center.
        Parameters:
        dist - How much to move in each direction.
        update - true to invoke manager-update. false otherwise.

      • isFloat

        public boolean isFloat()
        Description copied from class: State
        Method to decide whether the coordinates used to manage the data of this are of the type float. If false is returned, the representation of the internal coordinates of this may be assumed as int.
        Specified by:
        isFloat in class State
        Returns:
        true if and only if the coordinates saved in this are of the type float

      • getPosition

        public FloatVector3D getPosition()
        Returns the current position in GL-coordinates and thus the center of the bounding-box.
        Specified by:
        getPosition in class State
        Returns:
        The current position.

      • getBoundingBox

        public FloatBoundingBox getBoundingBox()
        Description copied from class: State
        Gets the current bounding box which represents the circumference of the currently depicted map.
        Specified by:
        getBoundingBox in class State
        Returns:
        the bounding box where the coordinates of the corners are of the type float if and only if this.isFloat() is true, otherwise the coordinate type can be assumed to be int

      • setBoundingBox

        public void setBoundingBox(BoundingBox box)
        Description copied from class: State
        Sets the bounding box which represents the circumference of the currently depicted map. The given bounding box must be an instance of FloatBoundingBox if and only if this.isFloat() is true, otherwise the invocation of this method will have no effect.
        Specified by:
        setBoundingBox in class State
        Parameters:
        box - the new bounding box for this, which must be an instance of FloatBoundingBox if this.isFloat() is true, and otherwise must be an instance of IntegerBoundingBox

      • setBoundingBox

        public void setBoundingBox(BoundingBox box,
                  boolean update)
        Sets the current bounding-box and updates the current position, so that it is in the middle of the box again.
        Parameters:
        box - The box to set.
        update - Indicates whether an update of all other states should be invoked.

      • is2DMode

        public boolean is2DMode()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the state is in 2D-mode.
